I have the same problem  i've tried multiple times to open lol but it isn't working ... i'm using a macbook pro so idk if thats the problem. I check it every minute doesn't open and the league of legends userkernel is still open idk whats the problem :( :(
try using the support forum where you get actual answers to questions like this....

My "Mac Client" Problem:
- Opens League
- League is frozen at 0%
- League Patcher quit unexpectedly.
nope been waiting about an hour now
hey bro me too i have the same problem as u and i dun know why this is happening anyone got a idea?
Try running as administrator, worked for me

hello myy friend, my name is zac, and as I can help u, I am not a lol admin or anything, just someone who plays lol, I had this problem to, just right click lol, then it should say somewhere, open with administrator, click on that and your problem is solved, thanx!
Happened to me yesterday. When I restarted my router and waited for a day, the problem was gone. Deleting specific files and reinstalling LOL didn't help me. Maybe you could try what i did.

it could be to do with the IPS issues that riot are having at the moment i find that if this happens to me it takes about half an hour for it to fix itself. i know this isn't much help but that's my experience it just started happening this week
It could be your firewall blocking you that might be the problem, it could also be that your internet is not allowing you to get onto league check with your isp
I changed the DNS to the google's one, and it solved the problem.

I had the same problem as well but i have found a simple solution i just ran league as administrator and it booted up fine and the problem hasn't occurred again, but i am not sure if this will fix it for macs and remember{{champion:150}} is love {{champion:150}} is life
try restarting your net, and your computer. It may work.
It opened up for me but connection error as soon as i try and do my password its fked.. pls help i've never had this problem

Not sure but yeah, about 3 hours ago this started happening to me, RADS errors, pvp.net Kernel Patcher errors, then sometimes im lucky to get past the patcher and then the log in screen, but it ends up saying login server not responding. If anyone has any answers that'd be swell
ye dude. Happened to me once, but i just logged back in and it was fine. My friend even had a problem but his was more severe. Probably just something that will last a day.
i logged in like 2 pm and it was fine left then tried didnt work .. damn
This is not the area you should post help request. Try heading over to the boards, or maybe make a support ticket.

what you need to do is find the directory of where league of legends was installed and find system file inside the RADS folder (for me it is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system)  and look for something called 'rads_user_kernel'and run that as administrator then try relaunch the game .. this should fix the problem as it did for me 
hope it works for you :)
Hmmm using mac it opened finnaly but it still in login... its messed up ? so got any advice for using a mac?
